name: NK orange
description: Еще одна вариация стиля форума Новости-космонавтики. Сохранена исходная цветовая гамма, изменен способ задания размеров шрифтов, убрана фоновая картинка.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("novosti-kosmonavtiki.ru") {
body, html {
background: none no-repeat fixed center top #050E1F!important;
font-size: 1em !important; 
color : #CECCCD !important; 
}

#wa2 div.forum-note-box div.forum-note-box-text {color : black !important; }

a,
a.visited { color:#f90 !important; }
a:hover,
a:active { color:#d9d2c8 !important; }

table.lha-colpic-tbl td.lha-col-cell  {font-size:0.5em !important;}

#wa div.newnomer p,
#wa div.nomer div.article span,
#leftcol div.left_news p a {font-size:0.8em !important;}

.card p.name,
#leftcol div.left_news p span,
#botmenustr,
div.in,
div.in1 {font-size:0.9em !important;}

#wa div.newnomer div.pred p {font-size:1em !important;}

span.bx-context-toolbar-button-text,
span.bx-context-toolbar,
span.bx-context-toolbar a {font-size:1.1em/2.3em  !important;}

div.lhe-dialog div.title td.title-text,
#wa div.newnomer h2 a,
.bx-tooltip-simple,
td.bx-popup-menu div.bx-popup-item td.item,
div.bx-core-admin-dialog-content table.notes td,
div.bx-core-admin-dialog-content table.edit-table table.internal td, 
table.edit-table table.internal table.in_internal td,
div.bx-core-admin-dialog-content table.edit-table td,
div.bx-core-dialog table.edit-tabs td,
div.bxhint,
div.bxhint td,
div.bx-core-window, 
div.bx-core-window table, 
.bx-core-waitwindow,
.bx-panel-tooltip-text,
.bx-panel-tooltip-title,
.bx-panel-tooltip-text a,
.bx-ilike-popup-name {font-size:1.1em !important;}

.lhepopup,
.lhe-cm,
span.lha-colpic-def-but,
span.lhe-list-font-span,
div.lhe-dialog table td,
div.bxlhe-frame,
.w h2,
#search-sform form input.submit,
#leftcol ul li,
div.bx-core-admin-dialog-content div.view-tab,
div.bx-core-admin-dialog-content div.view-tab-content,
div.bx-core-dialog-head .bx-core-dialog-head-content,
.bx-dialog-notify-text, 
#bx-panel .bx-dialog-notify-text a,
div.bx-core-dialog-content input, 
div.bx-core-dialog-content select, 
div.bx-core-dialog-content td,
div.bx-core-dialog-head .bx-core-dialog-head-content,
span.rating-vote-result {font-size:1.2em !important;}

h3,
h3 a,
#leftcol div h3 a,
.bx-core-dialog .dialog-head div.c span,
.bx-session-message {font-size:1.3em !important;}

.lha-textarea,
.w,
.achtung,
h1,
div.bx-core-dialog-head .bx-core-dialog-head-content p.title,
.bx-core-dialog  .dialog-foot div.c button, 
.bx-core-dialog  .dialog-foot div.c input {font-size:1.4em !important;}

div.bx-core-admin-dialog-content table.edit-tab-title td.title {font-size:1.6em !important;}
}
